title: Reign Of Kings v1.0.0 (R1) crack LumaEmu #Kortal
description:
Game: Reign Of Kings v1.0.0 (R1)
crack: LumaEmu, Kortal
files: Kortal


--- CLIENT ---

Game is x64 only, if you are running x86 OS, you can't play this game.

run ROK_Launcher.exe

Click Play
in the server browser, click search.
in the name textbox, input "kortal", click search.
Some cracked servers should show up. click on it, then connect.
The only server i'm running is the one listed below (Kortal's Area)
The others are kindly provided by the community.

OR 

input direct ip and click connect:port 4650

Please note you can only join cracked servers.


--- SERVER ---

Make a full copy of the game directory to a new one.
Configure your server settings in the ConfigurationServerSettings.cfg
Run at least once ROK_Launcher.exe and close the game.

Copy all files from the "Oxide.vxxxx" directory to the main folder.
You can get plugins at http://oxidemod.org

Run !start_server.bat file to start the server.
If you don't want to use Oxide on your server, you can use Server.exe

Please note I don't give any support about server hosting.

---

Get the full changelog here:

Have Fun !

Kortal
#kortal @ Quakenet
